pages.text: Tiarajudens eccentricus was an anomodont synapsid that lived during the Middle Permian in what is now southern Brazil. Despite its long, fearsome-looking sabre-like canines, Tiarajudens was actually a herbivore with multiple different types of teeth. The sabres were most likely used for either self-defence, or for fighting rivals of their own species.
